title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Episode 10 â€“ Freddie Gray and The Baltimore 6
description:
May 8, 2017 / Freddie Gray was arrested by patrol officers in the Western District. What does the backgrounds and case histories of Gray and the officers tell us about policing in the Western? 

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, Uncanny Valleys, VYVCH, and Sym5.

Thank you to our awesome sponsors!
www.BollandBranch.com use promo code UNDISCLOSED 
www.audible.com/Undisclosed 
www.blueapron.com/Undisclosed 

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
